title: Driver satisfaction with Uber U.S. 2017 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Response Somewhat agree, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL 434.0 among the 3 groups and in Strongly disagree, 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL 82.0.
In Response Somewhat agree, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 5 Responses and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Strongly agree.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2017 that was found in Response Somewhat agree was 4.09 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Response Strongly agree.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Response Somewhat agree had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 3 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Response Strongly disagree for 2018.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Response Somewhat agree, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL 434.0 among the 3 groups and in Strongly disagree, 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL 82.0.
In Response Somewhat agree, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 5 Responses and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Strongly agree.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2017 that was found in Response Somewhat agree was 4.09 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Response Strongly agree.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Response Somewhat agree, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL 434.0 among the 3 groups and in Strongly disagree, 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL 82.0.
In Response Somewhat agree, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 5 Responses and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Strongly agree.
Response Somewhat agree and Strongly agree had the biggest gap of 300.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2017.
Out of all 3 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of 2018.
2018 had the maximum SOME LABEL out of all 3 groups in Response Somewhat agree followed by 2018 in Somewhat agree, and the minimum SOME LABEL is found for 2018 in Strongly disagree.
Averaging all 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019, the Response Somewhat agree is the maximum SOME LABEL and Strongly disagree is the minimum SOME LABEL.
